frontmatter.title: Canam Systems
frontmatter.subtitle: web development
frontmatter.tagline: an <overhauled> look for a new line-up of products
frontmatter.overview: Coachella is a notorious cacophony of performances, selfies, installations, and general madness — and yet we went on location to get people’s attention. In anticipation of Childish Gambino’s new adidas shoe line and forthcoming performance, we sent invites to be the first to wear the shoes via AirDrop. What happened next, no one saw coming.
